column2: mark kunerthstory dana kleindirected by terry hughestranscribed by eleonora pheeboh sebastiano vanessa
you know you want it to happen as much as i do
let me make love to you
i don't wanna stand in the way of true love or anything but i think a canelope might hurt less
they gave me a big romantic story on days of our lives
it's the first time my character's got one
i'm so nervous you know i really want it to be good
i haven't seen you this worked up since you did that dog food commercial and you thought you were gonna be with a real talking dog
d'you want to come down to the set and tell me if i'm doing ok
hey you just have to promise not to get yourself thrown out again
hey that was an honest mistake
oh my god is this the men's room
oh i feel so foolish have you always known you wanted to be an actor
yeah that was an awesome day
so do you guys wanna come and eat dinner at the restaurant sometime in the next few weeks
we're booked solid for the next month
well i can't give you a massage because my licence has been revoked again
you know it's a lot of oil and sometimes the hand just slips
have i got a surprise for you
you guys aren't supposed to get divorced for 7 years
no i'm taking monica to a romantic inn in vermont
can you get out of work
i was just telling these guys that things are crazy at the restaurant
i made a reservation there and i need to change it oh what do you mean it's not refundable
can i just come some other time
oh can't you make an exception
tell them i'm a chef in a big new york restaurant
and tell them that in 2 weeks i will once again be a masseuse in good standing
i'm not paying for that room
well this is what happens when people live on the edge
uh don't you think that would be a little weird
i mean two guys in a romantic inn
no not if their room has two beds
hey joey is this the bed where olivia lost her virginity
i don't know but one of the extras sure did
thanks again for coming down to watch my scenes
honey just the fact that you want me here to support you i'm
oh in my head he's done some pretty not gay stuff
well at the christmas party him and santa did some definitely gay stuff
ok not that you need it but good
if you weren't here wondering if these guys were gay i don't know if i could do this
what are you doing in here
stopping you from marrying the wrong man and making the biggest mistake of your life
what do you know about love
i know what i felt that night when we kissed under the bridge
but let me ask you one question
can you really live the rest of your life never knowing what we could have been
i'm the one who doesn't have a choice because i
because i can't stop loving you
the duck in particular was superb
actually i do have one small complaint
the musician right outside the restaurant
it's kind of a mood killer
and there's a country called argentinaaaa it's a place i've never seeeeen
but i'm told for fifty pesos you can buy a human spleen
well you said that you had customers lined up in the street so i am here to entertain
it really has been great too you know some of this people must have seen me play before because they were requesting a bunch of my songs
yeah you suck and shut up and go home
you know how much i love listening to your music you know but
this is kind of a classy place
it wasn't just that she was fat the woman smelled like garbage
it wasn't just that she was fat the woman smelled like garbaaaaaage
hi chandler bing i have a reservation
welcome to the chestnut inn mr
bing so where are you joining from
i'm sorry he's a little bit wound up we had to stop at every maple candy stand on the way here
yeah i ate all my gifts for everybody
bing there's no record of your reservation in the computer
well that's impossible can you check again please
i called yesterday trying to cancel my reservation and i was told it was not refundable then we drove six hours all the way up here and now you tell me that we don't have a reservation
i don't know what to say
she doesn't know what to say
just give us the cheapest room you have
unfortunatly the only thing we have available is our deluxe suite the rate is six hundred dollars
dude let's drive home we'll hit all the maple candy stores on the way back and if
if they're closed maybe we'll tap a tree and make some ourselves
does that room have a closet i can lock him in
they are totally ripping us off
i know how we can make your money back
this is a nice hotel you know plenty of amenities we just load up on those
great at a hundred dollars an apple we're there
c'mon you get the idea ow ow ow we'll make our money back in no time
i think it's the sugar could you hold the apple
joey i gotta tell ya i've been thinking all day about that scene you did i mean you were amazing
oh you know the writing was good and the director is good and
and my co star's good but they're not as good as me
god you have to tell me what happens tomorrow
ow i'm just going over the script now
you wanna read lines with me
oh no i am not an actress
oh all right i can ask monica
oh screw her that part is mine
ok so just from the top of the page right here
hello drake i'm surprised to see you here
i can't believe you married him
but what choice did i have
he was keeping my sister in a dungeon
everything we feel for each other
knowing i'll never hold you in my arms again or touch your skin or feel your lips knowing i'll never make love to you
i can never kiss you again when it's all i can do not to kiss you right now
ah rach it doesn't say that
hi this is ross geller in suite 206
it seems you forgot a couple of things
could you have some complimentary toiletries sent up to my room
toothbrush toothpaste razor mouthwash deodorant dental floss band aids shaving cream after shave
and i feel like i am forgetting something
is there anything else you have that i haven't asked for already
yeah go ahead send up some tampons
nice put it with the others
we are four short of a bush o
god i feel so alive i love being in the country
i also got this great salt and pepper shaker from the restaurant
dude none of this is cool
no chandler you have to find the line between stealing and taking what the hotel owes you
for example hair drier no no no but shampoo and conditioners yes yes yes
now the salt shaker is off limits but the salt i wish i'd thought this through
i think i know what you mean though
the lamp is the hotel's but the bulbs
not my first time in a hotel my friend
no no no you can't take the remote control
thank you thank you very much
let's celebrate with some maple candy
at least tell me where you hid it
can i ask you a question
have you ever had any weird romantic dreams
oh when i was younger i used to dream that i got married to mayor mccheese and on our wedding night i ate his head
ok well this is like that
i had a dream last night that i wanted to kiss joey
wow do you mean like kiss him kiss him
i mean that was pretty intense
what do you think brought than on
i mean maybe that's something to do with the fact that i saw him do a love scene yesterday
i thought she was marrying connor
oh right real life more important
so do you think that my dream means anything
i mean you saw him do a love scene so maybe you don't have a thing for joey maybe you have a thing for drake
well it was joey reading drake's lines in the dream
trust me when it comes to psychology i know what i'm talking about
i took two psych classes in college
you took the same class twice
here monica look what i got to wear when i play at the restaurant uh huh wait
i mean this might even class up the ballad of the uncircumcised man
i really love listening to your music here but my restaurant is sort of an upscale place
right yeah ok i'll ask the butler to fetch my diamonds out of the vault
phoebe it's not what you wear
i just don't think you should play at the restaurant anymore
fine i'll just i'll take the hat back
hey so you guys the funniest thing happened at work
my songs aren't good enough for your restaurant
i didn't say your songs were not good enough
would they not go with your tiny portions of pretentious food
yeah well excuse me i ordered the smoked salmon appetizer but i can't see it i can't see it
oh really you want to talk about quality
have you heard of a key
it's what some people sing in
well at least all my songs don't taste like garlic
yeah there are other ingredients monica
ok so that's what we're doing
you know when i'm in the coffee house bopping along to one of your songs i'm wearing ear plugs
ear plugs or cloves of garlic
i take back what i said before
you keep playing at the restaurant because with your music driving people inside my bar sales are going up like crazy
what are people having the garlic martini
here's your copy of the bill we hope you enjoyed your stay
oh we did and you still have all your lamps
oh i didn't factor in the room tax
oh dude don't worry about it i found an unattended maid's car
we're way ahead of the game
there's something new in the bowl
look we have enough just walk away
thank you for a delightful stay
i thought someone was swinging a bag of cats against the wall
you'd better get back in that kitchen monica the garlic is not gonna overuse itself
ok you have to stop playing now
the only person my playing is bothering is you
ok let's settle this come on
get your garlic peelers off me
excuse me excuse me hi i'm monica geller
ok i was actually expecting a little applause there but whatever
ok quick question by a show of hands how many of you were bothered by this woman's singing outside
ok ok how many of you enjoyed the music outside
alright let me ask you this question how many of you thought the music was fine but not in keeping with the tone of the restaurant
ok well who identified the tone of this restaurant as pretentious comma garlicky
ok who thinks the food is delicious and a little pretention never hurt anyone
ok well alright who thinks the food is fine the music was fine but your evening was ruined by this incessant poll taking
alright here's a question who was so worried about her restaurant being fancy that she made a big deal about her friend playing her music and feels really bad about it now
who was so stupid and stubborn that she lashed out against her friend's cooking which she actually thinks is pretty great
wanna stick around and i'll whip you up some dinner
food here is ridiculously over p
who's hoping the hand raising thing is still cute enough that you won't hate me
joey do you have peanut butter on the back of your head
i thought i got it all
i was making a peanut butter smoothy right
and i couldn't find this little plastic thing that goes on top of the blender
how important can that be right
how is it going with drake
i don't think it's going very well
that scene i saw was so good
well i'm feeling really insecure about the one we are shooting tomorrow
joey is this that thing that you do when you say you're bad so i'll give you a compliment
yeah no i really am worried you know i mean i have to make it convincing that i'm in love with olivia
honey it can't be that hard i mean you've been in love before
this could be a little awkward
i'm just going to blow past it
well can't you just use that method actor thing where you use your real life memories to help you in your performance
what the hell are you talking about
just try to remember how you felt when you were in love and think about that when you're playing the scene
ok yeah i think i can do that
yeah ok there's this party scene coming up
and olivia and her husband are there and all drake wants to do is grab her and kiss her but he can't
and that makes me think about all those times when i wanted to grab you and kiss you but you didn't know so i would just pretend everything was cool but really it was killing me
you never talked about that before
hey you know what else i could use
there's a scene where drake sneaks into olivia's bedroom and she doesn't know he's there which never happened with us
and he knows he shouldn't be there but he just wants to look at her
and i remember all those mornings before you even put on your make up when i would think to myself my god she
and it hurts so much cuz i knew i could never tell you but it was worth it just to be there looking at you
i got you something from vermont
do you guys hear a buzzing
